channel.title: ASPROJECT | Unique content
channel.description:
[center][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/as2%20pictures/as.png[/img]
[b]Webclient[/b] [url=http://ancientscapeproject.tk]Click here[/url] [b]Forums[/b] [url=http://ancientscapepk.smfforfree3.com/index.php?action=forum]Click here[/url]
[center][b]Features![/b] -Major updates frequently -Ironman mode -Deadman mode -Great Economy -Great membership benefits -Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape -Tutorial island (Can be skipped) -Duel arena -Level points -Prestiging -Revamped PvP System -Amazing pking (PVP Style) -Buy 100, sell 100 -All skills are trainable -Pk points and pk point store. -Titles -Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! -Gold scrolls -Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids -New bosses always being added -Money vault -Dicing -Achievements -Bosses with unique attacks and special features -Boss slayer tasks and more! [/center]
[b]Pictures[/b]
[center]Shops[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/shops.png[/img]
[center]Completionist cape with fully working custom colours[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/completionist%20color.png[/img]
[center]Achievements[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/tasks.png[/img]
[center]Full working quests - MORE TO COME[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/quests.png[/img]
[center]Client[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/client.png[/img]
[center]Choose your game mode![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/choose%20your%20mode.png[/img]
[center]Ironman get there very own weapons which then can be upgraded![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/ironman%20weapons.png[/img]
[center]Deadman mode allows you to PK anyone, anywhere, at anytime![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/deadman.png[/img]
[center]Choose your faction to help you along the way! (Cannot change once chose)[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/factions.png[/img]
[center]Tutorial island - Can be skipped[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/tutorial.png[/img]
[center]Completionist/max cape rack[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/completion%20cape%20rack.png[/img]
[center]In game high-scores![/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/ingame%20highscores.png[/img]
[center]Titles[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/titles.png[/img]
[center]Membership information/benefits[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/mem%20benefits.png[/img]
[center]Money vault[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/money%20vault.png[/img]
[center]Non-Membership quest tab[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/questtab2.png[/img]
[center]Pking store[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/pking%20store.png[/img]
[center]Bank maker[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/bank%20maker.png[/img]
[center]Fishing 100% - Including rocktails[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/rocktails.png[/img]
[center]Woodcutting 100%[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/woodcutting.png[/img]
[center]Prestige-guide[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/prestige.png[/img]
[center]Storm of armadyl[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/stormofarmadyl.png[/img]
[center]Perfect PvP[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/pvp.png[/img]
[center]Bosses with custom mechanics[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/glacors.png[/img]
[center]20+ player raids[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/raid.png[/img]
[center]Single player dungeons[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/dungeons.png[/img]
[center]Gold scrolls[/center] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37430286/asproject%20pictures/scrolls.png[/img][/center]

item.title: ASPROJECT | Unique content
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I’d definitely check this out if I still played RSPS. Actually looks cool. A lot cooler than any other garbage that’s advertised here. Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: ASPROJECT | Unique content
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“scimi blood, post:3, topic:551241”][quote author=briney21 link=topic=670158.msg4481264#msg4481264 date=1430051819]
you have to pay money for chaotics wtf… looks like theres no effort put into it and just looking for $$ no thanks.
[/quote]

That awkward moment when I don’t take donations and that you can do dungeoneering for chaotics. Please stay away from my server.[/quote]
This isn’t Facebook nor is it Twitter or whoever the Hell else uses that damn phrase.

Anyway, there are some features here that can be built off of and make something interesting I’d say. Other than that, I would probably have to say that this doesn’t seem very intresting other than the average server. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: ASPROJECT | Unique content
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

looks like a decent OSRS server. Goodluck with this.

Read full topic

item.title: ASPROJECT | Unique content
item.dc:creator: @scimi_blood scimi blood
item.description:
@scimi_blood wrote:

briney21:

you have to pay money for chaotics wtf… looks like theres no effort put into it and just looking for $$ no thanks.

That awkward moment when I don’t take donations and that you can do dungeoneering for chaotics. Please stay away from my server.
